name: My Lovely Family Deluxe Bundle
description:
Experience the darker side of love in the My Lovely Family Deluxe Bundle, brought to you by the dark minds at Game Changer Studio and proudly published by the sinister enclave of Neon Doctrine.

This bundle includes:

My Lovely Daughter - Full Game
  • Inquisitor DLC
  • Artbook
  • Original Soundtrack
My Lovely Wife - Full Game
  • Artbook
  • Original Soundtrack
  • My Lovely Wife Comic
